# [Interview #506: JordanCon 2010 Q&A Report - Terez, Entry #17](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=506#17)

#### Seeker

If Ishamael took the Horn to the Pit of Doom, and the Dark One destroyed it, what would happen?

#### Maria Simons

I have no idea.
